def_cn: （尤指惊讶、震惊或疼痛时的）喘息，喘气，倒抽气
def_en: A gasp is a short quick breath of air that you take in through your mouth, especially when you are surprised, shocked, or in pain.

def_cn: （尤指惊讶、震惊或疼痛时）喘息，喘气，倒抽气
def_en: When you gasp, you take a short quick breath through your mouth, especially when you are surprised, shocked, or in pain.
You describe something as the last gasp to emphasize that it is the final part of something or happens at the last possible moment.
